name: Muffin Maker Deluxe
description:
It seems you have lots of orders coming your way! It's your job to create the desired muffins for the desired orders. Mess up on it and there'll be consequences.

This project was originally made to test my programming skills and I say I did pretty good for the most part. I would add more features, but I kind of lost a bit of motivation for it and didn't want to stick to just one big project. I'm overall glad that I got to create all the music, art, and programming. Depending on the support from this game, I may add more features, levels, and polishing.

Unity Asset Used:

Font - Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - TinyWorlds
